LanguageData.CommandAutoRebuildDesc: Automatically rebuild the trap after it is destroyed.
LanguageData.CommandRearmDesc: Rearm a sprung trap so it can be triggered again.
LanguageData.FirstGunDesc: Swaps to the main firing mode. In case of most turrets, it means a singleshot mode.
LanguageData.SecondGunDesc: Swaps to the alternative firing mode. In case of most turrets, it means a multishot mode.
